name: Before i wake
description:
The  little girl lost in a spooky haunted mansion. And you have to solve some puzzles to save her out of there...

#1 place in «Halloween 2019: Monster Madness!» contest

The game is in active development.
I would appriciate if you'll make a video of your first walkthrough,
and publish it to Youtube (or similar), or just send it to me.
This will help me to  make this game better.

Enjoy your playing.

WASD - movement
E - Interact
Tab - backpack
Space - Map
P - Pause (settings)

If you like my game - you could be interested to see my other games:
